channel.title: Drinknation.com Newest Mixed Drink Recipes
channel.description: The newest recipes to be added to Drinknation.com

item.title: Razzle Dazzle
item.description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Double Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a Lemon curl.

item.title: Dr. Forrester
item.description: Shake liquid ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass and garnish with a kiwi slice.

item.title: TV's Frank
item.description: Pour spirits into the glass; stir and top with whipped cream.

item.title: Neon Nuisance
item.description:
Pour the curacao and milk into a shot glass - should be about a shade of blue that I can only describe as electric pastel.
On a separate dish, combine the whipped cream and final ingredient of your choice until the cream turns a shade of pink. Scoop atop the shot glass and enjoy.

item.title: Smooth Criminal
item.description: Shake the first three ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Stir in syrup.

item.title: Wet Whopper
item.description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice for about 30 seconds. Strain into glass.

item.title: Melted Grape Popsicle
item.description: Put three or four ice cubes in a cocktail glass (preferably a cosmopolitan glass). Pour in soda, then curacao, grenadine and lemon juice. Drink should appear layered - stir to combine.

item.title: Oh, Canada
item.description: Add over ice in your glass.

item.title: Victory Drink
item.description: Over ice in a 12 oz. highball glass. Mix all ingredients and give a quick shake.

item.title: Mexican Martini #2
item.description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Optionally add a squeeze of lime juice.
